.. _class_AnimationNode_private_method__process:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **_process**\ (\ time\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, seek\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`, is_external_seeking\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`, test_only\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ ) |virtual| |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AnimationNode_private_method__process>`

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Currently this is mostly useless as there is a lack of many APIs to extend AnimationNode by GDScript. It is planned that a more flexible API using structures will be provided in the future.

ç»§æ‰¿ :ref:`AnimationRootNode<class_AnimationRootNode>` æ—¶ï¼Œå®ç°è¿™ä¸ªè™šæ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªåŠ¨ç”»èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä»£ç ã€‚å‚æ•° ``time`` æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹å¢é‡ï¼Œé™¤é ``seek`` ä¸º ``true``\ ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ä¸ºç»å¯¹å¢é‡ã€‚

è¯·åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è°ƒç”¨ :ref:`blend_input<class_AnimationNode_method_blend_input>`\ ã€\ :ref:`blend_node<class_AnimationNode_method_blend_node>` æˆ– :ref:`blend_animation<class_AnimationNode_method_blend_animation>` å‡½æ•°ã€‚ä½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`get_parameter<class_AnimationNode_method_get_parameter>` å’Œ :ref:`set_parameter<class_AnimationNode_method_set_parameter>` æ¥ä¿®æ”¹æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ã€‚

è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°åº”å½“è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªå¢é‡ã€‚

.. _class_AnimationNode_method_blend_animation:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **blend_animation**\ (\ animation\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, time\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, delta\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, seeked\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`, is_external_seeking\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`, blend\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, looped_flag\: :ref:`LoopedFlag<enum_Animation_LoopedFlag>` = 0\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AnimationNode_method_blend_animation>`

æŒ‰ ``blend`` é‡æ··åˆä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¨ç”»ï¼ˆåç§°å¿…é¡»åœ¨é“¾æ¥çš„ :ref:`AnimationPlayer<class_AnimationPlayer>` ä¸­æœ‰æ•ˆï¼‰ã€‚å¯ä»¥ä¼ å…¥æ—¶é—´ ``time`` å’Œå¢é‡ ``delta``\ ï¼Œä»¥åŠè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯å¦å‘ç”Ÿå¯»é“çš„ ``seeked``\ ã€‚

\ ``looped_flag`` åœ¨å¾ªç¯åç«‹å³ç”±å†…éƒ¨å¤„ç†ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å¦è§ :ref:`LoopedFlag<enum_Animation_LoopedFlag>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_AnimationNode_method_blend_input:

.. rst-class:: classref-method
